name: Full Data Receptacle Container
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Empty Data Receptacle Containers can be found on RK team mission bosses and dyna's. A Fixer can fill it and the owner of the container can use it to enter the Fixer Grid #L "Empty Data Receptacle Container" "275056" #L "Quiescent Grid Waveform Template" "265479" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Empty Data Receptacle Container + Quiescent Grid Waveform Template = #L "Full Data Receptacle Container" "275057" Skills: | No Skills Required | Note: by right clicking the full container it will revert to an empty container and also spawn: #L "Data Receptacle" "160978" Click the Data Receptacle on a Grid Terminal and you will be granted access to the Fixer Grid.
